robot_capabilities.duneRunner: Strong robot with front push arms. Provides steady pressure to bend the metal sheet at a controlled angle.
robot_capabilities.shoreHauler: Holds and anchors one end of the sheet firmly in place using a gripping frame to resist force during bending.
robot_capabilities.aquaRover: Fine-control robot with a manipulator arm. Aligns the sheet correctly before and after bending, and verifies the bend angle.

robot_morphology.duneRunner: Payload: ~12 kg, Speed: 0–3.5 m/s, Weight: 45 kg, Size: 800 × 400 × 550 mm, Push Arms: Heavy-duty, Force Output: High
robot_morphology.shoreHauler: Payload: ~25 kg, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 30 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 500 mm, Clamp Rig: Front mount, Stabilization: Active
robot_morphology.aquaRover: Payload: ~5 kg, Speed: 0–2.5 m/s, Weight: 12 kg, Size: 400 × 350 × 200 mm, Arm Reach: 400 mm, Angle Sensor: Included

task_specific_rules: aquaRover positions the metal sheet for bending.
shoreHauler anchors the back end firmly in place.
duneRunner pushes to apply force and bend the sheet to desired angle.
task_replanning_rules: If the sheet slips during push, reset alignment using aquaRover.
If force exceeds duneRunner’s limit, pause and retry in smaller increments.
If shoreHauler loses grip, all robots must stop and reposition the sheet.
